biography: Jasper graduated from the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts  in 1990. He first worked on-set, beside James Coburn, 30 years ago, in  Death of a Soldier. Jasper has had the opportunity work beside such  luminaries as: James Coburn, Russell Crowe, Geoffrey Rush, Heath Ledger,  Guy Pearce, Rachael Griffiths, James Nesbit and Brian Cox. Jasper has  only just recently returned from Asia where he played a lead villain in  Japan's first ever spy thriller motion picture 'Joker Game.' Also, in  his capacity as mentor, Jasper regularly directs self-tests for  Hollywood screen tests for professional actors.
name: Jasper Bagg
